MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Keywords: build monitor,visual studio addin,compile time,build time,build measure
English.Char_Desc_45: Measures and monitors Visual Studio builds
English.Char_Desc_80: Measures and monitors Visual Studio builds and gathering PC performance data
English.Char_Desc_250: Measures and monitors Visual Studio builds, gathering PC performance data and information about running processes. Keeps a persistant log of this data, allowing the user to see how much time they spend compiling and building.
English.Char_Desc_450: Measures and monitors Visual Studio builds, gathering PC performance data and information about running processes. Keeps a persistant log of this data, allowing the user to see how much time they spend compiling and building. Displays graphs and statistics about the PC's performance, including hard disk activity, memory status, context switches and related information.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Measures and monitors Visual Studio builds, gathering PC performance data and information about running processes. Keeps a persistant log of this data, allowing the user to see how much time they spend compiling and building. Displays graphs and statistics about the PC's performance, including hard disk activity, memory status, context switches and related information.
